argument.description: The string to return the length for. string1 can be CHAR, VARCHAR2, NCHAR, or NVARCHAR2. string1 can not be CLOB or NCLOB.

returnType: The LENGTHC function returns a numeric value. If string1 is NULL, then the LENGTHC function will return NULL.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL LENGTHC function returns the length of the specified string, using Unicode complete characters.
sample:
LENGTHC(NULL)
Result: NULL

LENGTHC('')
Result: NULL

LENGTHC(' ')
Result: 1

LENGTHC('TechOnTheNet.com')
Result: 16

LENGTHC('TechOnTheNet.com ')
Result: 17
